#Library Installation

```{r}
library(zoo)
library(forecast)
library(ggplot2)
library(tseries)

```

```{r}
 time <- 1:200
 seasonal <- 10*sin(2*pi*time/12) + rnorm(200)
 
 ts2 = zoo(seasonal, time)
 plot(ts2)
```

#Perform ADF test

```{r}
 adf.test(ts2)
 
```

#Perform ACF test

```{r}
acf(ts2)
 
```

#Perform PACF test

```{r}
pacf(ts2)
 
```

#Fit an automated ARIMA model

```{r}
 model = auto.arima(ts2,trace=TRUE, seasonal= TRUE)

```

#Model Summary

```{r}
summary(model)

```

#Forecasting for 2 years

```{r}
forecast_future= forecast(model, h=24)
plot(forecast_future, main="Forecasted model")
```

#Ljung_Box test for model validation

```{r}
Box.test(forecast_future$residuals,type="Ljung-Box")
```
